title: The Fae's Fire
description: When Moira Downing traveled to the small lakeside town of Loughsidhe, Ireland she wanted to bury her not much beloved grandmother and move on with her life. Could an intensely erotic encounter with an otherworldly stranger change her fortunes?18+ only. This 5,700 word short story includes explicit, steamy sex scenes with a paranormal creature. Adults only.
author: Mia Dean
